metadata.commander_name: Major General Terry de la Mesa Allen Sr.

narrative.title: 1St Infantry Division - 1942Q4
narrative.situation: American Triangular Infantry Division deployed in North Africa during 1942Q4.
narrative.objectives: First US Army division to conduct opposed amphibious landing in European Theater. Assaulted Vichy French-defended Oran on November 8, 1942 (Operation Torch). Triangular division (3 infantry regiments vs. old square 4-regiment structure). Emphasis on combined arms, fire and maneuver, and aggressive patrolling.
narrative.axis_objective: Hold current positions and prevent Allied breakthrough.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and neutralize Axis defensive positions.

weather.terrain: coastal plain and mixed terrain (urban Oran, coastal hills)

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Amphibious assault trained (though limited pre-invasion preparation)
First US division with M1 Garand semi-automatic rifle as primary weapon
Combined arms coordination at regimental level
